name: The Thing

abilities.name: Ground Pound
abilities.details: Slams the ground, damaging and disrupting nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Yancy Street Charge
abilities.details: Charges forward, damaging and knocking back the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Bodyguard
abilities.details: Intercepts a portion of damage dealt to a targeted ally for a few seconds.

ultimate.name: It's Clobberin' Time!
ultimate.effect: Enters an empowered state for 8s: Greatly increased damage resistance, faster attack speed, and punches cause small AoE shockwaves.
ultimate.details: Unleashes his signature battle cry and full strength.

passives.name: Rock Hide
passives.details: High base damage resistance. Immune to minor knockback effects.

teamups.partner: Mr. Fantastic / Invisible Woman / Human Torch

lore: Ben Grimm, transformed by cosmic rays into the super-strong, rock-skinned Thing. Despite his monstrous appearance, he has a heart of gold and is the powerhouse of the Fantastic Four.
